modShortDescription: This modlet is designed to increase the zombie spawn rate up to 3x the vanilla default. I have scaled things for balance and server performance.
modDescription:
This modlet is designed to increase the [zombie](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) spawn rate up to 3x the vanilla default.

I have scaled things for balance and server performance.

## Installation in 3 Steps

1. Create a Mods folder in your 7 Days to Die directory. By default in Steam itâ€™s located here: **C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\7 Days To Die**
2. Download my modlet and move the entire folder 3x-zombies into the Mods folder.
3. Launch the game.

If you have any issues or suggestions, please get in touch!

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/11Cfpgl4wL5cT28qGULgVS-dYS3aZ46h-?usp=sharing)** from Google Drive  
**[Download](https://github.com/mattwoodley/3x-zombies/archive/refs/heads/main.zip)** from GitHub

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25188-server-side-3x-zombie-spawn/).

**Credits:** [M17Woodley](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/m17woodley/)
